ingredients.item: 350ml vegetable stock (using 1 Kallo Very Low Salt Organic Vegetable Stock Cube)
200g pack essential Waitrose Greek Light Salad Cheese

instructions.step: Place the bulgar wheat in a saucepan with the stock, bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 3 minutes.  Turn off the heat and leave to steam for 5 minutes until tender and the liquid has been absorbed. Stir in the tomatoes, parsley and lemon juice.  Remove the skin and pith from the grapefruit and cut away the segments over a bowl to catch the juices.  Add the segments and juice to the tabbouleh.  Crumble in the salad cheese with the pine kernels and season. Griddle the chicory cut-side down for 1-2 minutes until lightly charred, then serve topped with the tabbouleh.
